attributes.action: set up systems to ensure that foreign nationals, migrants and visa-holders do not recourse to public funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the main features of the majority of UK visas for entry into the UK is the requirement that applicants do not recourse to public funds. Many visa holders break these rules and are allowed to do so by GP's, dentists and other public servants who allow them to access services funded by the taxpayer which means that they are infact recoursing to public funds.
